name: Word of Mouth Stories. Vol 1
storyline: A small creepy city and two different stories of two different characters. Survival horror from a third person, without autosaves and with a lack of resources, with a camera over your shoulder. In the game you will meet different stories with different levels and different enemies, atmospheric locations, limited inventory, and VHS stylistics.
summary: A collection of scary stories that go around a small town. Word of Mouth Stories. Vol 1 is a third-person survival horror game inspired by the classics of the genre. Formidable enemies, atmospheric levels, and the style of old games and movies from the VHS era.
